name: Hunter Conclave
description: Hunters are rangers who specialize in fighting against the most dangerous threats to civilization. They develop techniques for battling formidable foes, including giants, dragons, and hordes of enemies.

hunters_prey.description: At 3rd level, you gain one of the following features of your choice to enhance your combat effectiveness against specific threats.

details.extra_damage: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra 1d8 damage if it’s below its hit point maximum.
details.limit: You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

details.reaction_attack: When a Large or larger creature within 5 feet of you hits or misses you with an attack, you can use your reaction to attack that creature immediately after its attack, provided that you can see the creature.

details.additional_attack: Once on each of your turns when you make a weapon attack, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target and within range of your weapon.

defensive_tactics.description: At 7th level, you gain one of the following defensive features to help you survive against attacks.

details.disadvantage_on_opportunity_attacks: Opportunity attacks against you are made with disadvantage.

details.bonus_to_ac: When a creature hits you with an attack, you gain a +4 bonus to AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

details.advantage_on_saving_throws: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

multiattack.description: At 11th level, you gain one of the following multiattack options to deal with groups of enemies more effectively.

details.ranged_attack: You can use your action to make a ranged attack against any number of creatures within 10 feet of a point you can see within your weapon’s range.
details.ammunition_requirement: You must have ammunition for each target, as normal, and you make a separate attack roll for each target.

details.melee_attack: You can use your action to make melee attacks against any number of creatures within 5 feet of you, with a separate attack roll for each target.

superior_hunters_defense.description: At 15th level, you gain one of the following defensive features to further enhance your survivability in combat.

details.dexterity_saving_throw: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw to take half damage, you take no damage on a success and only half damage on a failure.

details.reaction_attack: When a hostile creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to force that creature to repeat the same attack against another creature (other than itself) of your choice.

details.reaction_damage_reduction: When an attacker you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack’s damage against you.
